description.translate: No matter what the injury, nothing is worse for him than being away from his own people.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§5La douleur de l'éternän\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Peu importe la blessure, rien n'est pire\"}","{\"text\":\"§7pour lui qu'être loin des siens.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7No matter what the injury, nothing is worse\"}","{\"text\":\"§7for him than being away from his own people.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a1 §7HAS§a2 §7DAR§a3 §7HER§c-1\"}"]}}
